page.title: 01Ravendale, the general area
page.content: Our block is made up of four villages in a very rural setting. The area is quite hilly and the land is devoted to farming, mainly arable farming, but with a small percentage of dairy and beef cattle. The villages are Beelsby, Hatcliffe, East and West Ravendale. The community is partially composed of farmers and farm workers but the villages today are mainly dormitory villages for Grimsby, the nearby town and the Humber Bank Industries. The Ravendale Valley is a local beauty spot used as a picnic area in the summer and for toboganning in the winter.
